original_text: And when we heard these things, both we, and they of that place, besought him not to go up to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 우리가 그 말을 듣고 그 곳 사람들과 더불어 바울에게 예루살렘으로 올라가지 말라 권하니

sentences.original_text: And when we heard these things
both we, and they of that place
besought him not to go up to Jerusalem
